item.title: CVE-2022-2898|2024-09-17T00:35:51.431Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server%20and%20client
item.description: Measuresoft ScadaPro Server and Client (All Versions) do not properly resolve links before file access; this could allow a denial-of-service condition.
